name: Broken Reflections
description:
Find Ginboz, he is hiding in one of those special mirrors.

Try to trace his reflections back to him.

P.S You only have 4 bullets

Controls:

Gamepad / Keyboard Mouse

Shoot - Right Shoulder / Left Click

Jump - X / Space

Navigate - Axis / WASD + Mouse

Open Secret Level - D-pad left / 2

Back to Main Level - D-pad right / 1
